backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, shops, updates, OTP entries, and access‑controlled queries and mutations with storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report mapping frontend files to feature requirements, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for various frontend files and their roles in the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with custom LocalBuzz color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, protected routing with OTP and identity checks, and authenticated layout via MobileAppShell.
frontend/src/components/AppBackButton.ts: Reusable back button using app-specific navigation fallback logic.
frontend/src/components/LocationStatusCa: UI card showing location permission state with badges, guidance text, and actions to request or refresh location.
frontend/src/components/MobileAppShell.t: Provides the main mobile app layout with header, routed content, logout handling, and conditional bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/OtpLoginCard.tsx: Implements a two‑step phone and OTP login flow with validation, resend, copy demo code, and success callback.
frontend/src/components/ShopOpenClosedTo: Renders a simple two‑button toggle for marking a shop as open or closed.
frontend/src/components/ShopUpdatePostCa: Displays a shop update card with image, status, description, distance, and expiry info.
frontend/src/constants/shopCategories.ts: Defines the canonical list and type for shop categories used for filtering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating related queries when it changes.
Provides safe in‑app back navigation with fallback routes based on authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerHomeFeed.t: Fetches, filters, augments, and sorts nearby shop updates based on location and category.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocationPermission: Handles location permission state, errors, and fetching of geolocation coordinates with browser API fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationPermis: Provides a hook to check browser notification support, track permission changes, and request permission.
frontend/src/hooks/useOtpChallenge.ts: Defines mutations for requesting an OTP and verifying it through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useOtpSession.ts: Manages OTP verification state and phone number persistence using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistLastKnownLo: Saves the user's latest coordinates to the backend when identity and location are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps React Query calls for user profile and location data, including mutations that update and invalidate cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useShop.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching, registering, and updating a user's shop via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopUpdateNotifica: Detects new feed items and triggers browser notifications with duplicate and rate‑limit safeguards.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopUpdates.ts: Fetches all updates for the caller's shop and provides a mutation to create new updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a warm theme palette with light/dark mode variables and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider setup.
Renders the customer feed with location filtering, categories, and notification controls, integrating multiple hooks.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and OTP verification flow, redirecting authenticated users to role selection.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectionPage.tsx: Lets users choose shop or customer role, saves profile, and redirects based on persisted role with session checks.
frontend/src/pages/ShopDashboardPage.tsx: Displays shop info, registration state, updates list, and navigation for posting updates and editing shop details.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPostUpdatePage.ts: Form for creating shop updates with image upload, validation, and selectable expiry dates.
Handles creating or editing shop profiles with image upload, location permission, and form validation.
frontend/src/utils/geo.ts: Provides distance calculations, formatting, and radius checks using the Haversine formula.
frontend/src/utils/notificationStorage.t: Manages notification opt-in, enabled timestamp, notified update IDs, and per‑shop daily notification counts using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/phoneNumber.ts: Validates and normalizes Indian phone numbers to +91 E.164 format and formats them for display.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Provides date/time helpers for converting to backend nanosecond format, computing future timestamps, and checking expiry.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, architecture, issues, and existing features for the LocalBuzz app.
